doc.title: Available variable and function objects
doc.click: : The URL object of the clicked link. For details, see
doc.page: : The URL object of the current web page (usually the address bar), detailed introduction See
doc.pageHost: : The domain name of the current web page
doc.clickpath: : The path of the clicked link
doc.isSameDomain: : Whether it is the same domain name, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.
doc.isSameSubDomain: {{ss}}: The same domain name. Note that although the main domain names of {{yy}} and {{ff}} are both {{mm}}, the sub-domain names are {{ww}} and {{ffss}} respectively. So their domain names are different.
doc.isSameParent: : Whether it is the same parent path, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.
doc.isPageSublink: : Whether the current page is a subpage of the clicked link, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.
doc.isPageMultilevelSublink: : Whether the current page is an infinite subpage of the clicked link, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.
doc.isClickSublink: : Whether the clicked link is a sub-link of the current page, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.
doc.isClickMultilevelSublink: : Whether the clicked link is an unlimited sub-link of the current page, {{tt}} is yes, {{ff}} is no.

tab.title: tab page
tab.rightTab: : The link opens in a new tab on the right
tab.leftTab: : The link opens in a new tab on the left

functions.title: Available function objects
functions.minimatch: : The {{gg}} matching method uses the {{mm}} library. Please see See for the usage method, or you can also search for the usage method of {{gg}}.
